extendedInfo.description: Your local yellow pages provider, Front Door Direct is proud to release our new FDD Local app.FDD Local allows you to find local businesses that offer the products and services that you need. Quickly find businesses and people local to your community. Get instant access to addresses, phone numbers, and business websites. Use the map feature to get directions to your desired location. Commonly used categories provide easy access. Now you have all you need to search locally in a single app. FDD Local is your local search expert.Serving the local Colorado communities of Ft Collins, Greeley, Loveland, & Windsor. FDD Local has the most up-to-date information on your local communities. Finding what you need has never been easier or more convenient.App features include:-   Business search-   People search-   Quick one-tap search for popular categories-   Browse all the categories-   Call any phone number with a single tap-   Locate businesses on a map and get directions-   View business websites
